title: iPod Shuffle
overview: The world's most wearable music player, iPod Shuffle lets you take up to 240 songs with you anywhere in a lightweight, clip-on design.
details: Clip-on design for maximum portability and convenience.
Holds up to 240 songs, making it perfect for workouts and on-the-go listening.
Available in five vibrant colors, including four new hues.
iTunes autofill feature creates a fresh playlist every time you sync.
Shuffle mode for a dynamic listening experience.
Includes an easy-to-use control pad for navigating songs.
USB dock for quick charging and syncing with iTunes.
Up to 12 hours of skip-free music playback.

specifications.Battery Life: Up to 12 hours of continuous playback
specifications.Audio Formats: MP3, AAC, WAV, AIFF, Apple Lossless
specifications.Connectivity: USB dock for charging and syncing
